title: Self-Directed Learning Competency Development Program in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Fundamental Understanding of Social Studies
context.additional_context: Project execution and self-directed learning competency emphasis in a smartphone-based accessible environment

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% attendance rates and weekly learning plan completion rates in blended learning environments
Learners provide/receive feedback at least three times through peer interactions during PBL assignments
Learners confirm a 20%+ improvement in self-directed learning competency via self-assessment tools by course completion
Learners independently navigate and utilize over 90% of learning materials using mobile-optimized digital platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
